Package Clients.OffLineTool

Class Summary
ACSStatus This class is responsible to get the ACS information using offline tools, to do that, just make a ping to the ACS manager, if this method return true, then ACS is up, else ACS is down.
AlmaStatus This class is responsible to "calculate" the Alma status based on the Sub systems status, thats why on the constructor receive a SubsystemsStatus instance.
AntennaStatus This class is responsible to get the offline antenna information, to do that, this class obtain the antenna component reference, using the client from ACSClient, get the containerservices and obtain a reference to antenna, this references is stored to reuse during the execution of the program.
CorbaStatus This class display the corba status, to do that, just try to get the list of initilized services, if its possible to retrieve this list, then Corba is up, else corba could be on error or Unknown.
SubsystemStatus This class show the subsystem status, to do that, using the container services from the AdvancedComponentClient on ACSClient, this class get the reference to each subsystem and obtain the needed information, then create a report with all subsystems on JSON format to be returned throw getStatus method.
